title: new translations from transifex do not show up in minor releases
body:
new translations from transifex do not show up in minor releases

some examples:
 
pictures in the menu has been translated in transifex with 'afbeeldingen', 
https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/owncloud/resource/gallery/l/nl/view/
while in de gallery.po file there is 'plaatjes':
gallery.po-#: appinfo/app.php:42
gallery.po-msgid "pictures"
gallery.po:msgstr "plaatjes"
similar to the strings of the user_migrate modules (to be reached via the settings menu), all is translated but on the oc gui (settings) there are still a lot of english terms:
https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/owncloud/resource/user_migrate/l/nl/view/

in settings
https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/owncloud/resource/settings/l/nl/view/
is group admin translated with 'groep beheerder', but in the oc gui there is still group admin.

> thomas mã¼ller wrote:
> only git master is synchronized with transifex - in case you are running
> 4.5.x we need to look into the versioned translation files within github.

the examples i gave are older changes, and i would expect these to be part of at least oc-4.5.2 (and perhaps 4.5.1).

in github there is for example:
https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/l10n/nl/settings.po
246: #: templates/users.php:80 templates/users.php:112
247: msgid "group admin"
248: msgstr "groep beheerder"

it was changed at:
c88cf5ca â» deepdiver1975 
2012-10-13 [tx-robot] updated from transi

320:#: templates/users.php:80 templates/users.php:112
321:msgid "group admin"
322:msgstr "groep administrator"

now when i change from head to 4.5.3 the git settings.po matches the one that 
i've installed.
https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/v4.5.3/l10n/nl/settings.po

so the changes that are made in transifex.com are only applied to head.  those 
are not copied to a branch like 4.5.3?  that's a pity (bug).

when can one see the updated translations?  is it possible to get translations updated in a branch like 4.5.4?
